team.name: Sam Rodriguez
team.bio: With 8 years of experience, Sam brings expertise in specialty coffee brewing and latte art. Passionate about educating customers on coffee origins and brewing techniques.

team.name: Maria Gonzalez
team.bio: Maria creates our artisanal menu with locally sourced ingredients. Her background in French pastry and modern cuisine brings unique flavors to every dish.

team.name: David Kim
team.bio: David ensures every customer has an exceptional experience at BrewHaven. His attention to detail and warm personality make every visit memorable.
